metadata.name: File and Directory Discovery - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects usage of system utilities such as "find", "tree", "findmnt", etc, to discover files, directories and network shares.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/file')) AND process.cmd_line rlike '\(.\)\{200,\}' OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ls')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-r')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/find')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/tree')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/findmnt')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/mlocate'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of system utilities such as "find", "tree", "findmnt", etc, to discover files, directories and network shares.
